short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily access Flip from any browser window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flipâ€™s simple, free, and accessible video discussion experience makes learning fun, fulfilling, and empowering. Install the Flip extension to easily find and respond to discussion topics in your Flip groups. Simply open the extension and enter your join code!  

Keyboard shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + F to open the extension.
